It's paradise!

It's on Florida's east coast; known as The Treasure Coast and located 1/4 mile north of the Jensen Beach Causeway; Walk to Waterfront Restaurants + pubs for the best seafood and umbrella drinks or go for the best pizza on the island along with a beer just a mile away; ice cream parlor right across the street; it's a golfer's paradise too w/many courses to choose from + also a baseball fan's paradise: NY Mets train in Port Saint Lucie; St. Louis Cardinals + Jupiter Hammer Heads train in Jupiter,  Houston Astros +
The Washington Nationals train in West Palm Beach; FL Panthers ice hockey team train in Sunrise.

Enjoy water sports, Surfing, Diving, Fishing, relax on the beach + get an amazing tan; take a cruise, play some Tennis, Pickle Ball, go Biking or Horseback Ride on the Beach; Live Theater, Gambling Arcades, Treasure Coast Mall, Botanical Gardens, Farmers Market, Flea Market, Live Auctions, Marine Aquatic Center; Manatee Education Center; Museums; so much to do.
Located in between Orlando and Miami is Sebastian, Port Saint Lucie, Stuart, Jupiter, West Palm Beach, Deerfield Beach, Boca Raton, Fort Lauderdale + Hollywood
